CRW_Llendreth |guid = b8239915-5cbf-4be6-80e1-8c6c0cc97fd2 }} '''Llendreth''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background Llendreth is a wild orlan fighter and expert helmsman from [Eir Glanfath](/eirGlanfath/). He is fearless and impulsive, traits that are exemplified when the Watcher first enters [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/) and witnesses the orlan kill a fellow pirate over their differences in opinions regarding the best method of pulling gold teeth from dead bodies. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = * Upon entering [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/), you can witness Llendreth shoot a fellow pirate over an argument. |crew = {{crewrank|3|helmsman}}
Personality: Fearless, Impulsive
{{cp2|600}} to hire. }} ## Trivia * Can only be hired via [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/) at [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/), and not from the [Dunnage](/dunnage/) harbormaster supplies.
